Name: Putin VS Zombies
About the game: Putin Vs Zombies is story about defending the world from the forces of Evil with various towers, traps and your fellow comrades: Billy ♂The Angel♂ Herrington and Barack ♂The Nuke♂ Obama . Discover new means of defence, travel around the globe and destroy the ♂ Slaves ♂ of Evil even in the most ♂ deep dark ♂ corners of the planet. Unique characteristics Different special abilities Unique towers, traps, barricades Lots of memes to kek at Exciting story with you beloved characters
